posts.post_title: N/A: 1910 Philadelphia Athletics Composite Oversized PC
posts.post_content:
This is the oversized (4" x 5 1/2") version, published by Burke & Atwell.  

N/A delivered, PayPal F/F.  PM me or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks!
Kris

Price drop to N/A delivered.

Included are HOFers Eddie Plank, Chief Bender, Home Run Baker, Eddie Collins and, of course, Connie Mack.
Great postcard, the oversized version is much tougher than the standard.
